Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 98th overall pick, by Malibu in 1962...
Released by Malibu on 4/1/1963...
Had first career hit (double) on 6/23/1970, off Carl Vieira (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/28/1970, off Keith Heath (SHP)...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 3/1/1979 to a minor league contract.
Signed as a free agent by Penn on 2/3/1980 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by New Jersey on 3/1/1981 to a minor league contract.
